title: XForms
description: This is the XForms stencil set specification.

stencils.title: XForm
stencils.description: A XForms form.

properties.title: id
properties.description: This is a unique Id that distinguishes the form from other forms.

properties.title: name
properties.description: Name is an attribute that is text description of the form.

properties.title: version
properties.description: This defines the version number of the form model.

properties.title: head
properties.description: The form page's head markup.

properties.title: namespaces
properties.description: The original namespace declarations (serialized).

stencils.title: Input
stencils.description: An input control.

properties.title: default value
properties.description: The default value is displayed, when the form is loaded.

properties.title: inputmode
properties.description: Hint to the user agent to select an appropriate input mode for the text input

properties.title: appearance
properties.description: Optional attribute to define an appearance hint.

properties.title: incremental
properties.description: If true, this form control will generate additional xforms-value-changed events

properties.title: navindex
properties.description: Integer used to define the navigation sequence

properties.title: accesskey
properties.description: Shortcut for moving the input focus to this control

properties.title: type
properties.description: Any xsd:QName representing the expected datatype

properties.title: readonly
properties.description: Any expression that is convertible to XPath boolean

properties.title: required
properties.description: Any expression that is convertible to XPath boolean

properties.title: relevant
properties.description: Any expression that is convertible to XPath boolean

properties.title: calculate
properties.description: An expression used to calculate a string value for the associated instance data node

properties.title: constraint
properties.description: A predicate that needs to be satisfied for the associated instance data node to be considered valid

properties.title: p3ptype
properties.description: A P3P data element indicating the specific kind of data collected here

properties.title: step
properties.description: Value to use for incrementing or decrementing

stencils.title: Submit
stencils.description: Renders a submit button

properties.title: resource
properties.description: Attribute indicating the destination URI for submitting instance data.

properties.title: action
properties.description: DEPRECATED optional attribute indicating the destination URI for submitting instance data. Use resource attribute instead.

properties.title: mode
properties.description: This attribute controls whether or not the submission response processing is performed as part of the default processing of event xforms-submit.

properties.title: method
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the protocol operation to be used to transmit the serialized instance data.

properties.title: validate
properties.description: Optional boolean attribute that indicates whether or not the data validation checks of the submission are performed.

properties.title: relevant
properties.description: Optional boolean attribute that indicates whether or not the relevance pruning of the submission is performed.

properties.title: serialization
properties.description: Optional attribute that controls how and whether to serialize instance data as part of the submission.

properties.title: version
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the version of XML to be serialized.

properties.title: indent
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying whether the serializer should add extra white space nodes for readability.

properties.title: mediatype
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the mediatype for XML serialization of instance data.

properties.title: encoding
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying an encoding for serialization.

properties.title: omit-xml-declaration
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying whether to omit the XML declaration on the serialized instance data.

properties.title: standalone
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying whether to include a standalone declaration in the serialized XML.

properties.title: cdata-section-elements
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying element names to be serialized with CDATA sections.

properties.title: replace
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying how the information returned after submit should be applied.

properties.title: instance
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the instance to replace when the replace attribute value is 'instance'.

properties.title: target
properties.description: Optional attribute containing an XPath expression that indicates the target node for data replacement.

properties.title: separator
properties.description: Optional attribute specifying the separator character between name/value pairs in urlencoding.

properties.title: includenamespaceprefixes
properties.description: Optional attribute providing control over namespace serialization.

properties.title: appearance
properties.description: Optional attribute to define an appearance hint.

properties.title: navindex
properties.description: Integer used to define the navigation sequence

properties.title: accesskey
properties.description: Shortcut for moving the input focus to this control

properties.description: Defines the items, the Itemset contains.

stencils.title: Choices
stencils.description: This element is used within selection form controls to group available choices.

stencils.title: Action
stencils.description: Causes its child actions to be invoked in the order that they are specified.

stencils.title: Set Value
stencils.description: This action explicitly sets the value of the specified instance data node.

stencils.title: Insert
stencils.description: This action is used to create one or more nodes of instance data by cloning one or more existing instance nodes.

stencils.title: Delete
stencils.description: This action deletes one or more nodes from instance data.

stencils.title: Set Index
stencils.description: This action marks a specific item as current in a repeating sequence.

properties.title: repeat
properties.description: Required reference to a repeating element.

properties.title: index
properties.description: Required XPath expression that evaluates to a 1-based offset into the sequence.

stencils.title: Toggle
stencils.description: This action selects one possible case from an exclusive list of alternatives in a switch.

properties.title: case
properties.description: Optional reference to the case element to select.

stencils.title: Set Focus
stencils.description: This action dispatches an xforms-focus event to the element identified by attribute control.

properties.title: control
properties.description: Optional reference to a form control.

stencils.title: Dispatch
stencils.description: This action dispatches an XML Event to a specific target element.

properties.title: name
properties.description: Optional name of the event to dispatch.

properties.title: target
properties.description: Optional reference to the event target.

properties.title: delay
properties.description: Optional attribute that indicates the minimum number of milliseconds to delay dispatching of the event to the target.

properties.title: bubbles
properties.description: Optional boolean indicating if this event bubbles.

properties.title: cancelable
properties.description: Optional boolean indicating if this event is cancelable.

stencils.title: Rebuild
stencils.description: This action results in rebuilding any internal data structures used to track computational dependencies among instance data nodes.

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Recalculate
stencils.description: This action causes that instance data nodes whose values need to be recalculated are updated.

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Revalidate
stencils.description: This action results in the instance data being revalidated as specified by the processing model.

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Refresh
stencils.description: This action results in the XForms user interface being refreshed.

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Reset
stencils.description: This action is used to reset the instance data.

properties.title: model
properties.description: Optional XForms Model selector.

stencils.title: Load
stencils.description: This action traverses the specified link.

properties.title: ref
properties.description: Optional link to an external resource to load.

properties.title: show
properties.description: Optional link behavior specifier.

stencils.title: Send
stencils.description: This action initiates submit processing.

properties.title: submission
properties.description: Optional reference to a submission element.

stencils.title: Message
stencils.description: This action encapsulates a message to be displayed to the to the user.

properties.title: level
properties.description: Optional message level identifier.

properties.title: message
properties.description: Optional message text to show.
